other_tests.findings: Substantial disruption of the myocytes, with dense, predominantly mononuclear inflammation, thickened endocardium, and multiple giant cells with nuclei localized at the peripheral edges.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat endomyocardial biopsy 2 months later revealed no evidence of active myocarditis.

other_tests.findings: Sinus bradycardia with intermittent sinus arrest and third-degree atrioventricular block.
Wide-complex tachycardia at a rate of 160 beats per minute.
